mapper.sql: ID, MODULE, TITLE, DETAIL, GRADE, LEADER_ID, LEADER_NAME, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, PARENT_ID, APPLY_DEPT, APPLY_USER_NAME, START_TIME, END_TIME, PROGRESS, OVERDUE_DAY, OVERDUE_REASON, IS_COMPLETE, COMPLETE_TIME, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into task (ID, MODULE, TITLE, DETAIL, GRADE, LEADER_ID, LEADER_NAME, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, PARENT_ID, APPLY_DEPT, APPLY_USER_NAME, START_TIME, END_TIME, PROGRESS, OVERDUE_DAY, OVERDUE_REASON, IS_COMPLETE, COMPLETE_TIME, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_TIME ) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{module,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grade,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{leaderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leaderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{applyDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{progress,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{overdueDay,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{overdueReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isComplete,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{completeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update task
MODULE = #{module,jdbcType=BIGINT},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DETAIL = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRADE = #{grade,jdbcType=BIGINT},
LEADER_ID = #{leaderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEADER_NAME = #{leaderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMBER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMBER_NAME = #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

OVERDUE_REASON = #{overdueReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_COMPLETE = #{isComplete,jdbcType=BIGINT},
COMPLETE_TIME = #{completeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update task set MODULE = #{module,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DETAIL = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRADE = #{grade,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LEADER_ID = #{leaderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEADER_NAME = #{leaderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMBER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMBER_NAME = #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=CHAR}, APPLY_DEPT = #{applyDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLY_USER_NAME = #{applyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PROGRESS = #{progress,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OVERDUE_DAY = #{overdueDay,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OVERDUE_REASON = #{overdueReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_COMPLETE = #{isComplete,jdbcType=BIGINT}, COMPLETE_TIME = #{completeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from TASK
and TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{title}, '%'))
